Mitt Romney , a former Massachusetts governor, is not expected to announce any plans until the spring. One of the lessons that Mitt Romney learned from the last campaign is that things got started too soon, said Mitt Romney spokesman Eric Fehrnstrom . "He's in no hurry to announce his plans."
